input.sentences: this was our first vacation together .
[female] had brunch with a few birds . it was so hilarious .
here we are standing in front of some beautiful scenery . we were so in love .
finding water this blue is hard .
it was a nice sunny day on the beach . the sand was so hot .
output.sentences: We have just arrived at the beach as the first day of our vacation.
We sat at a table outside at brunch and a seagull tried to steal our food!
After we found a beautiful spot to stop and take a lovely photo.
As we headed down to the water we were having a hard time finding a spot to put our chairs down.
After a nice day we decided to grab one more photo to remember our sunny retreat.
